statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_information;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email, subscriber_phone FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_id > 10;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscriber_address FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_information ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscriber_phone FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_email = 'bob@example.com' OR subscriber_address LIKE '%Street%' AND subscriber_id < 100 ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscriber_email, subscriber_phone FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC, subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_info;
SELECT name, email FROM subscriber_info WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number FROM subscriber_info ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE status = 'online';
SELECT device_id, last_updated FROM device_status WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_info WHERE subscriber_id = 100;
SELECT name, email FROM subscriber_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_info ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT s.name, s.email, d.status FROM subscriber_info s JOIN device_status d ON s.subscriber_id = d.subscriber_id;
SELECT AVG(subscriber_id) as avg_subscriber_id FROM subscriber_info;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone_number FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT subnet_name FROM subnet WHERE subnet_address LIKE '%.1' AND subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Subnets FROM subnet;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type IN ('Mobile', 'Tablet') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_information;
SELECT name, email FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, event, log_time FROM network_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT status, last_update FROM device_status WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_information;
SELECT name, email FROM subscriber_information WHERE subscriber_id = 1001;
SELECT subscriber_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM device_status GROUP BY subscriber_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT event, log_time FROM network_logs WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Server Room');
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status='Active';
SELECT network_name, network_status FROM network_status WHERE network_id=1;
SELECT log_description, log_time FROM logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, address FROM subscribers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM devices WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT network_name, network_status FROM network_status WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE subscriber_id != 1);
SELECT log_description, log_time FROM logs ORDER BY log_time DESC, log_id ASC;
